title: (4) Sargent T-Zone Classroom Lever Locksets - retail over $2,000
item_description:
(4) Sargent T-Zone Classroom Lever Locksets - retail over $2,000

  • 3 - Sargent 11G37
  • 1 - Sargent 11G05
  • The SARGENT 11 Line has a unique, T-Zone construction providing strength and durability for the most demanding applications such as schools and hospitals. This is accomplished by true interlocking between the lockbody and the latchbolt.
  • Reliable: no through bolts or surface screws to be installed. T-Zone construction prevents the lock from twisting
  • Flexible: utilizes one lock body for multiple functions, simplifying facility maintenance
  • Secure: torque-resistant construction enables lock to withstand tough environments
  • ANSI F84 Classroom
  • Deadlocking latch
  • Latchbolt by either lever unless outside lever is locked by key
  • Key in outside lever locks or unlocks outside lever
  • Inside lever always operative
  • Applications
  • High traffic areas – offices, public buildings, hospitals
  • High abuse areas – institutions, schools, retail
